alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Upper Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 01 at 3:23AM MST until March 02 at 12:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest New Mexico. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Upper Gila River Valley
